headline: 2 Unstoppable Streaming Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist in 2025, According to Wall Street
summary: Spotify Technology (NYSE: SPOT) operates the world's largest music streaming platform, whereas Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) is the dominant streaming provider for movies and TV shows. headline: Spotify’s partner program for podcast hosts is now available
summary: Spotify announced Thursday the launch of its new “Partner Program” that lets popular podcast hosts monetize their video content. Spotify’s new program gives qualifying creators on its platform opportunities for extra income beyond just advertising revenue, such as video payouts. The program was initially announced back in November and is officially available in the U.S., the U.K., Canada, and Australia starting Thursday.
